name: 5-Minute Breathing
instruction: Focus on your breath, in and out, naturally and gently.

name: 10-Minute Body Scan
instruction: Slowly scan your body from head to toe, releasing tension.

name: 15-Minute Mindfulness
instruction: Observe your thoughts without judgment, returning to the present.

name: Walking Meditation
instruction: Walk slowly and deliberately, feeling each step.

name: Loving Kindness
description: Cultivate compassion for self and others
instruction: Send loving thoughts to yourself, loved ones, and all beings.
